nodes.text: The GALAAR-15 was a heavy blaster carbine in production by the time of the Galactic Civil War. The origins of the carbine's name could be found in the Mandalorian language, specifically the Mando'a word galaar, which translated to "hawk" in Galactic Basic Standard.
Kad Solus, a young Mandalorian mercenary from Clan Awaud, carried a GALAAR-15 and made use of the blaster carbine in combat.
The GALAAR-15 blaster carbine was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game adventure book Friends Like These, published on December 8, 2016.
